targets.rawSql:
select
  ref_month,
  sum(nb_patients_controlled) nb_patients_controlled
from heart360_patients_catagory
group by 1

panels.title: Patients protected from heart attacks and strokes with world-class treatment

panels.description:
Estimated population with hypertension is derived from Community Survey.

Patients under care are patients with hypertension with at least 1 visit in the past 12 months.

targets.rawSql:
select 
  heart360_patients_registered.ref_month,
  100.0 as estimated_people_with_hypertension_pct,
  (sum(cumulative_number_of_patients)::numeric / 8000.0 * 100.0) as registered_pct_of_estimated,
  (sum(NB_PATIENTS_UNDER_CARE_REGISTERED_BEFORE_THE_PAST_3_MONTHS)::numeric / 8000.0 * 100.0) as under_care_pct_of_estimated,
  (sum(nb_patients_controlled)::numeric / 8000.0 * 100.0) as controlled_pct_of_estimated
from heart360_patients_catagory
join heart360_patients_registered on heart360_patients_registered.ref_month = heart360_patients_catagory.ref_month and heart360_patients_catagory.facility= heart360_patients_registered.facility
where heart360_patients_catagory.ref_month=(select max(ref_month) from heart360_patients_catagory where $__timeFilter(ref_month))
group by 1

panels.title: Hypertension treatment cascade

defaults.displayName: % Patients with  BP <140/90 at latest visit in the past 3 months

targets.rawSql:
select 
    ref_month,
    100.00 * sum(nb_patients_controlled) / (0.000001 + sum(NB_PATIENTS_UNDER_CARE)) as Control_rate
from HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY
group by 1

panels.title: BP controlled at latest visit in past 3 months

defaults.displayName: % Patients with BP â‰¥140/90 at latest visit in the past 3 months

targets.rawSql:
select 
    ref_month,
    100.00 * sum(nb_patients_uncontrolled) /(0.000001 + sum(NB_PATIENTS_UNDER_CARE)) as Control_rate
from HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY
group by 1

panels.title: BP uncontrolled at latest visit in past 3 months

defaults.displayName: % Patients with no BP measure recorded in past 3 months

targets.rawSql:
select 
    ref_month,
    100.00 * sum(nb_patients_no_visit) / (0.000001 + sum(NB_PATIENTS_UNDER_CARE)) as Control_rate
from HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY
group by 1

panels.description: Patients with hypertension with at least 1 visit in the past 12 months

targets.rawSql:
select 
    HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.ref_month,
    sum(cumulative_number_of_patients) cumulative_number_of_patients,
    sum(NB_PATIENTS_UNDER_CARE_REGISTERED_BEFORE_THE_PAST_3_MONTHS) as nb_patients_under_care,
    sum(nb_new_patients) nb_new_patients
from HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY
left outer join heart360_patients_registered
    on HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.ref_month = heart360_patients_registered.ref_month 
    and HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.facility=heart360_patients_registered.facility
group by 1

panels.title: Patients under care

panels.description: Patients with hypertension with no visit in the past 12 months

defaults.displayName: % Patients with no BP measure recorded in the past 12 months

targets.rawSql:
select 
  heart360_patients_under_care.ref_month,
  (100.0 * sum(COALESCE(heart360_patients_under_care.nb_patients_lost_to_follow_up, 0))) / 
  NULLIF(sum(HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.nb_patients_under_care), 0) as lost_to_follow_up_pct
from heart360_patients_under_care
left join HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY 
  on heart360_patients_under_care.ref_month = HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.ref_month
  and heart360_patients_under_care.facility = HEART360_PATIENTS_CATAGORY.facility
group by 1

panels.title: 12 month lost to follow-up

options.content: Treatment outcomes for patients with hypertension at their latest visit before <u>**${reference_month:date:MMMM YYYY}**</u>

targets.rawSql:
select
    ref_month,
    facility,
    nb_patients_under_care,
    nb_patients_newly_registered,
    nb_patients_controlled,
    (100 * nb_patients_controlled) / (0000001 + nb_patients_under_care) as per_patients_controlled,
    nb_patients_uncontrolled,
    (100* nb_patients_uncontrolled) / (0000001 + nb_patients_under_care) as per_patients_uncontrolled,
    nb_patients_no_visit,
    (100* nb_patients_no_visit) / (0000001 + nb_patients_under_care) as per_patients_no_visit
from heart360_patients_catagory
where ref_month= (select max(ref_month) from heart360_patients_catagory where $__timeFilter(ref_month))
;
